data.current_summary: Return list of Flight Offers based on searching criteria.
data.summary_suggestion: Search flight offers by query parameters
data.description_suggestion: Searches for available flight offers based on query parameters including origin, destination, departure date, travelers, and travel class. Accepts up to 14 search criteria parameters. Returns a collection of flight offers with pricing, itinerary details, and availability information. Results are sourced from real-time flight data. Useful for building flight search interfaces with flexible filtering options.

data.current_summary: Return list of Flight Offers based on posted searching criteria.
data.summary_suggestion: Search flight offers with request body
data.description_suggestion: Searches for available flight offers using a structured request body containing search criteria such as origin, destination, departure date, travelers, and travel class preferences. Accepts a GetFlightOffersQuery object with comprehensive search parameters. Returns a collection of flight offers with pricing, itinerary details, and availability information. Preferred for complex searches with multiple criteria or programmatic integrations.

data.current_summary: Return list of Flight Offers based on searching criteria.
data.summary_suggestion: Search flight offers by query parameters
data.description_suggestion: Searches for available flight offers based on query parameters including origin, destination, departure date, travelers, and travel class. Accepts up to 14 search criteria parameters. Returns a collection of flight offers with pricing, itinerary details, and availability information. Results are sourced from real-time flight data. Useful for building flight search interfaces with flexible filtering options.
